=item B<--safe-mode>
Do not use OpenGL2 features (such as shaders). Useful on systems that repor
t support for OpenGL 2, but its implementation is buggy. Used as a work-aro
und for the "broken fonts" bug.
=item B<-c, --config-file> I<file> =item B<-c, --config-file> I<file>
Use I<file> for the config filename instead of the default F<config.ini>. Use I<file> for the config filename instead of the default F<config.ini>.
